channel.title: Anyone listen to some death metal
channel.description:
[b][/b]
Death metal p0wnz. It's my favorite type of music. Talk to me about death metal and name me some of your favorite bands and their albums.
Here are my favorites:
Album- Artist Slaughter of the Soul- At the Gates Left Hand Path- Entombed Imperial Doom- Monstrosity Screams of Anguish- Brutality Retribution- Malevolent Creation Envenomed- Malevolent Creation (MC destroys everyone I don't care what you say :cool:) Still Life- Opeth Subterranial Magnitude- Diabolic Tomb of the Mutilated- Cannibal Corpse (pretty much anything Cannibal Corpse is freakin awesome. I don't really consider any of their albums lacking or weak in anything. They are the gods of death. My next fav album is probably Gallery of Suicide; Kill ain't bad either.)
Come on. Listen to death. You know you like it... :|
"Make everything metal, blacker that the blackest, black times infinity"

item.title: Anyone listen to some death metal
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

I watched a Discovery Channel or something show about Death and Black Metal. About this dude who got influenced into it, then the occult, and wound up dead and wasn’t found for 6 years.
The history on a Norweigan Black Metal band named Mayhem is pretty weird. Their first singer shot himself in the head, then their first guitarist stabbed the second singer to death(I think.)
